2020-09-will-mother.title: Mother’s will naming Adam
2020-09-will-mother.summary: Death of mother; will naming Adam.
2020-09-will-mother.details: According to available records, Adam’s mother died in September 2020 and left a will naming him. At that time no disputes were recorded in court.

2021-04-father-dx-will.title: Father’s will confirmed
2021-04-father-dx-will.summary: Will in favor of Adam confirmed prior to father’s passing.
2021-04-father-dx-will.details: By April 2021, Adam’s father had already executed a will in Adam’s favor. Medical details of third parties are omitted in the public version.

2021-07-father-death-claims.title: Father’s death; suits contesting wills filed
2021-07-father-death-claims.summary: Relatives filed suits contesting the parents’ wills.
2021-07-father-death-claims.details: In July 2021, following the father’s death, suits were filed to contest the parents’ wills. The proceedings resulted in interim restrictions pending review.

2021-07-asset-freeze.title: Court‑ordered asset freeze and restrictions
2021-07-asset-freeze.summary: Freeze on accounts and real estate remains in force.
2021-07-asset-freeze.details: A court‑ordered asset freeze and related restrictions were imposed on accounts and real estate. The freeze remains in effect.

2021-09-apartment-dispute.title: Occupancy dispute regarding Adam’s apartment
2021-09-apartment-dispute.summary: Dispute over occupancy during asset freeze.
2021-09-apartment-dispute.details: During travel for medical evaluation, a dispute arose over occupancy of Adam’s apartment. Questions of residence and use became subject to the ongoing freeze and subsequent proceedings.

2021-11-prelim-scheduled.title: Preliminary hearing scheduled
2021-11-prelim-scheduled.details: The court scheduled a preliminary hearing on the inheritance case for July 2024.

2022-03-hearing-travel.title: Hearing on permission to travel for treatment
2022-03-hearing-travel.summary: Court considered permission to travel abroad for treatment.
2022-03-hearing-travel.details: The court considered granting Adam permission to travel abroad for treatment. Objections were filed by the plaintiffs; a court‑appointed medical evaluation was conducted.

2022-03-permission-travel.title: Permission to travel for treatment granted
2022-03-permission-travel.summary: Court authorized travel abroad for therapy.
2022-03-permission-travel.details: The court granted Adam’s request and authorized travel abroad for therapy.

2022-05-visit-med-exam.title: Incident at residence; court guidance on examinations
2022-05-visit-med-exam.summary: Court confirmed examinations require consent or legal basis.
2022-05-visit-med-exam.details: An incident at Adam’s residence led to police involvement. The court clarified that compulsory medical examinations require consent or a valid legal basis. Restraining measures regarding access were applied in connection with the incident.

2024-06-eviction-start.title: Eviction proceedings initiated regarding relative
2024-06-eviction-start.summary: Eviction process initiated; later reviewed by court.
2024-06-eviction-start.details: In late June 2024, eviction proceedings were initiated concerning a relative occupying Adam’s apartment. The court later found no procedural violations in the filing.

2024-07-docs-fee.title: Submission of documents; court fee paid
2024-07-docs-fee.summary: Procedural documents submitted; required fee paid.
2024-07-docs-fee.details: Prior to the preliminary hearing, procedural documents were submitted. A required court fee was paid (amount omitted in the public version).

2024-07-prelim-hearing.title: Preliminary hearing; scenarios outlined
2024-07-prelim-hearing.summary: Court outlined possible outcomes; settlement discussions noted.
2024-07-prelim-hearing.details: At the preliminary hearing, the court outlined possible outcomes of the inheritance dispute. Settlement discussions did not result in an agreement.

2024-07-motion-freeze-relatives.title: Motion regarding relatives’ accounts
2024-07-motion-freeze-relatives.summary: Request for freeze and transaction review filed.
2024-07-motion-freeze-relatives.details: A motion was filed requesting a freeze of relatives’ accounts and a review of transactions. The court took the motion under consideration.

2024-08-relatives-freeze.title: Court order on relatives’ accounts
2024-08-relatives-freeze.details: The court granted a freeze on relatives’ accounts for the purposes of review within the proceedings.

2025-07-unfreeze-motion.title: Motion to modify asset freeze
2025-07-unfreeze-motion.summary: Request filed to fully or partially modify restrictions.
2025-07-unfreeze-motion.details: A motion was filed seeking full or partial modification of the asset freeze on health and treatment‑related grounds. This public version omits medical specifics and counsel’s internal positions.

2026-11-hearing-scheduled.title: Hearing on motion scheduled
2026-11-hearing-scheduled.summary: Court scheduled a hearing for November 2026.
2026-11-hearing-scheduled.details: According to the docket, the court scheduled a hearing on the motion for November 2026.
